name: DayFall (Swell)
description:
Dayfall is a project I am working on, it will be a top down zombie survival shooter.

At Dayfall's cuurent state, please expect bugs, glitches, and featureless gameplay for the time being.

Alpha 1.1 Changelog:

-New titlescreen UI

-Added Singleplayer, Multiplayer, Options, and Return to Desktop buttons

-Added a semi functional inventory(items deleted upon dropping them)

-Added new menu sounds

-Added horrible swimming sounds

-Added a new punch sound effect

-Changed the word "Aplha" to "Alpha" in the top right because I'm illiterate
